<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/extract"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Extracts main content and citation from URL

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"url","in":"query","description":"URL to extract content from","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"full","in":"query","description":"Return full HTML content if set to true","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean","default":false}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Extracted content or HTML","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"html":{"type":"string","description":"Full HTML of the page"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"Title of the page"},"content":{"type":"string","description":"Extracted content summary of the page"}}}}}},"500":{"description":"Server error or missing URL parameter","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string","description":"Error message"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
